dataIdInfo.idPurp: Location of heritage properties in City of Toronto
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Listed, Part IV, Part V & Intention properties are included. Please note, some properties indicated as "designated" may be subject to an intention to designate by City Council, and should be considered fully designated for the purposes of alterations and permitting. For more information, please contact Yasmina Shamji at 416-392-1975.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: City of Toronto: City Planning; Graphics & Visualization Section
